QuestData.Title: Too Many Irons in the Fire
QuestData.Description:
We must slay the Iron Horde troops who infest our lands.
Find those who would sully our great forest and show them the hand of justice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Iron Horde at Mor'gran Logworks.
QuestData.RewardText: The Iron Horde has no consideration for the wonders of the forest. In death, they will know respect.
